entry.title: What to expect
entry.content:
Going to be sharing my notes and other security related materials. Topics to be covered will include:

  1. Linux fundamentals
  2. Bash scripting
  3. Python For hackers
  4. Automation using python and bash
  5. Web hacking fundamentals
  6. Mobile hacking fundamentals(Android)
  7. CTF writeups(hopefully)
  8. Usage of common hacking tools
entry.summary: Going to be sharing my notes and other security related materials. Topics to be covered will include:
